levelList.name: Weight of Knowledge
levelList.desc:
Gain (Insight x 5% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] Discard the Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] This Slot gains 2 Aggro next turn

levelList.name: Weight of Knowledge
levelList.desc:

[WhenUse] Discard the Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots

levelList.name: Weight of Knowledge
levelList.desc:

[WhenUse] Discard the Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] This Slot gains 5 Aggro next turn

levelList.name: Excruciating Study
levelList.desc:
Gain (Insight x 15% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded

levelList.name: Excruciating Study
